7. cut - remove sections from each line of files
上一页 第 24 章 Text Processing 下一页
Home | Mirror | Search

7. cut - remove sections from each line of files

列操作

$ last | grep  'neo' | cut -d ' ' -f1
        
$ cat /etc/passwd | cut -d ':' -f1
root
daemon
bin
sys
sync
games
man
lp
mail
news
uucp
proxy

$ cat /etc/passwd | cut -d ':' -f1,3,4

# cat /etc/passwd | cut -d ':' -f1,6
root:/root
bin:/bin
daemon:/sbin
adm:/var/adm
lp:/var/spool/lpd
sync:/sbin
shutdown:/sbin
halt:/sbin
mail:/var/spool/mail
uucp:/var/spool/uucp
operator:/root
games:/usr/games
gopher:/var/gopher
ftp:/var/ftp
nobody:/
vcsa:/dev
saslauth:/var/empty/saslauth
postfix:/var/spool/postfix
sshd:/var/empty/sshd
rpc:/var/cache/rpcbind
rpcuser:/var/lib/nfs
nfsnobody:/var/lib/nfs
ntp:/etc/ntp
nagios:/var/log/nagios

行操作

$ cat /etc/passwd | cut -c 1-4
root
daem
bin:
sys:
sync
game
man:

$ echo "No such file or directory"| cut -c4-7
such

$ echo "No such file or directory"| cut -c -8
No such

$ echo "No such file or directory"| cut -c-8
No such
